price: (Nyankopͻn) kaa sε: “Iblis, εdeεn na asi wo kwan a woamfa w’anim ammͻ fͻm amma deε Mede me nsa abͻ? Woayε akεsesεm anaasε woka wͻn a wͻma wͻn ho soͻ no ho?
arabic: قَالَ يَٰٓإِبۡلِيسُ مَا مَنَعَكَ أَن تَسۡجُدَ لِمَا خَلَقۡتُ بِيَدَيَّۖ أَسۡتَكۡبَرۡتَ أَمۡ كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلۡعَالِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qāla yāib'līsu mā manaʿaka an tasjuda limā khalaqtu biyadayya astakbarta am kunta mina al-ʿālīna
